object.text: TOWARDS ARROW IN FLIGHT to CATCH

object.name: Instruction
object.text: Move into an enemy or barrel to grab

object.text: Then hold toward the door and tap to throw

object.name: Instruction
object.text: Hold and a direction to sprint past archers
Teach basic combat with first low-level enemies
Introduce dodging enemy encouraging player to use run in combat
Teach long-range combat with stones to throw at slingers Avoid their stones then pick up and throw them back
Teach grabbing with guarding enemy and barrier broken only by thrown enemy
Entry hall with archers shooting from arrow slits
Armory with mixed enemies and introducing throwable weapons
Mess hall with food, throwable and breakable furniture, stronger mix of enemies

End room
Holding cells with captured kids
